attributes.action: Allow makeup and not lock the toilets at school
attributes.additional_details: Because of females self confidence and periods people that are on there period are having problems in school but they lock the toilets.
attributes.background: Make it okay to allow mobile phones makeup and socks at schools and not to lock the toilets

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for indvidual schools.
